body:
![selu](https://latex.codecogs.com/gif.latex?selu%28x%29%20%3D%20%5Cbegin%7Bcases%7D%5Clambda%20*%20x%2C%20%26%20%5Ctext%7Bif%7D%5C%20x%20%3E%200%20%5C%5C%20%5Clambda%20*%20%5Calpha%20*%20x%20-%20%5Clambda%20*%20%5Calpha%2C%20%26%20%5Ctext%7Bif%7D%5C%20x%20%5Cleq%200%20%5Cend%7Bcases%7D)
This should be

```
(activations < static_cast<T>(0)).select(
             gradients * (activations + scale_alpha * scale), gradients * scale);
```
